name: Enhanced Survival Experience
description: A comprehensive mod pack that enhances the Vintage Story survival experience with quality-of-life improvements, expanded content, and immersive gameplay features. This pack includes mods for better food management, improved combat, expanded crafting options, enhanced visuals, and numerous gameplay tweaks to make your survival journey more enjoyable and engaging.

metadata.summary: A comprehensive mod pack enhancing survival with QoL improvements, expanded crafting, combat overhauls, and immersive features.
metadata.text:
## Enhanced Survival Experience Mod Pack

This mod pack transforms your Vintage Story experience with a carefully curated selection of mods that enhance gameplay, improve quality of life, and add depth to your survival journey.

### Key Features

**Quality of Life Improvements:**
- **No Offline Food Spoil**: Food won't spoil while you're away from the game
- **Extra Info**: Enhanced information display for better gameplay awareness
- **Freedom Units**: Display measurements in imperial units
- **Dana Tweaks**: Various gameplay tweaks and improvements
- **Auto Map Markers**: Automatic map marking for better navigation

**Food & Survival:**
- **Expanded Foods**: Adds a wide variety of new food items and recipes
- **Food Shelves**: Better food storage solutions
- **A Culinary Artillery**: Advanced cooking and food preparation
- **Better Firepit**: Improved firepit functionality

**Combat & Equipment:**
- **Combat Overhaul**: Enhanced combat mechanics
- **Quivers and Sheaths**: Better weapon storage and organization
- **Blood Trail**: Visual feedback for combat
- **Armory**: Expanded armor and weapon options
- **Maltiez Crossbows & Firearms**: Advanced ranged weapons
- **Bear Armor Repair**: Repair functionality for bear armor

**Building & Crafting:**
- **Scaffolding**: Safe building at height
- **Bricklayers**: Enhanced brick and block building
- **Just the Palisades**: Palisade building options
- **VS Roofing & No Roofing Recipes**: Roofing system improvements
- **Stone Quarry**: Efficient stone extraction
- **Smithing Plus**: Enhanced smithing capabilities
- **Millwright**: Advanced milling and processing
- **Material Needs**: Realistic material requirements

**Visual & Immersion:**
- **Real Smoke**: Realistic smoke effects
- **Immersive Lanterns**: Better lighting options
- **Terra Pretty**: Enhanced terrain visuals
- **Temporal Symphony & Cave Symphony**: Atmospheric audio enhancements
- **Rivers**: Natural river generation
- **Biomes**: Expanded biome variety
- **Vanilla Variants**: More block and item variations

**Technology & Systems:**
- **Alchemy**: Advanced alchemical crafting
- **Expanded Matter**: New materials and resources
- **Recipe Patcher**: Custom recipe support
- **Useful Traders**: Enhanced trading system
- **Carry On**: Improved item carrying mechanics
- **Player Corpse**: Corpse system for death

**Utilities:**
- **VS IMGUI**: Enhanced user interface
- **Common Lib & Config Lib**: Shared libraries for mod compatibility
- **Overhaul Lib**: Core library for overhaul mods
- **Farseer**: Enhanced vision and detection
- **Step Fix Elk**: Terrain step improvements
- **Snow Caps**: Snow accumulation effects

### Installation

1. Import this mod pack JSON file into the Vintage Story Mod Loader
2. The loader will automatically download and install all required mods
3. Enable the mod pack to activate all mods at once
4. Start a new world or load an existing one to enjoy the enhanced experience

### Compatibility

This mod pack is designed for Vintage Story 1.21+. All mods have been tested for compatibility, but as with any mod pack, some conflicts may occur. Always back up your world before applying a mod pack.

### Notes

- Some mods may require specific game versions
- Check individual mod pages for detailed compatibility information
- The pack includes both client and server-side mods
- Some mods may require configuration adjustments for optimal gameplay

Enjoy your enhanced Vintage Story survival experience!
